PeriodicSyncEventTag.summary:
The tag read-only property of the
interface returns the developer-defined identifier for
the . This is specified when calling the
method of the
interface. Multiple tags can be used by the web app
to run different periodic tasks at different frequencies.

remarks.para:
-Richer offline experiences with the Periodic Background Sync API
-A Periodic Background Sync demo app

PeriodicSyncEventTag.value: Returns a of the defined identifier.
